title: The Rebel and Miss Jones
description: Plain Jane Sara Jones cherishes the quiet life, and is most certainly unfamiliar with danger. So when she finds her life literally in jeopardy, and she is rescued by what can only be described as a risk-taking stranger, she feels as if she's in her very own superhero movie!As she gets to know Dr. Reece Fletcher, Sara blossoms under his mischievous and rebellious gaze. With each passing day he begins to awaken a firecracker she didn't know existed!
author: Annie Claydon
